settings.heading: My One Stop Online Store
settings.body: Jamaica Hardware Store does customer service right. Whatever the need for your home or business you can count on them Great for the neighborhood and like I said best service that is provided. Much better than Big Box stores. Highly recommend them to friends and family and to whomever sees this review

settings.heading: Jim Ryan
settings.body: I need the machine screw to hold the faucet on bathtub for some reason it is missing one on a new place. I took the screw out of the hot water tap bottle and went off to the hardware store. They kind of sort of matched it and had two alternate appointment. $2.70 who cares that I've paid $1.35 twice for two different rates. As far as using the store, they don't let you wander around anymore there is no more grounds in it in the hardware store. you tell them what they want and they go back and find it. Have a pleasant and helpful and are surviving the PANDEMIC recovery thing.

settings.heading: Daniel Noparast
settings.body: This is the go to place for all your paint and hardware needs. Im a local contractor and I've shopped with many paint vendors, but this store in particular is hands down the best. They're prices are very competitive and their service is impeccable. They have my business for as long I'm in business

settings.heading: Daniel Arthur
settings.body: I love this store. Great and caring staff. A bit pricey but what you going to do, they have what others don't have and only God knows what they are paying for it. Thats the way of the world these days. All in all great store.
